chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
q: nat
l: nat
Hr: 1 < q -> 4 <= r
y: nat

Goal:
CodeNat y <-> l = 0 /\ 1 < q /\ y = 0 \/ 0 < l /\ (exists z v v1 p0 p1 p2 r1 : nat, p0 = r /\ r1 + 1 = p0 /\ p1 = power (1 + l) 2 /\ p2 = power p1 p0 /\ seqs_of_ones v v1 /\ Code y /\ Code z /\ y + l * p2 = z * v ⇣ (r1 * v1) /\ y + v1 + p0 * p0 = z + p2)

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal Init.Nat.mul 1)
Notation r := (power (4 * q) 2)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
seqs_of_ones = fun u u1 : nat => l + 1 < q /\ u = sums.u /\ u1 = sums.u1 : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments seqs_of_ones (_ _)%nat_scope
CodeNat = fun c : nat => is_cipher_of (fun i : nat => i) c : nat -> Prop Arguments CodeNat _%nat_scope
Code = fun a : nat => exists f : nat -> nat, is_cipher_of f a : nat -> Prop Arguments Code _%nat_scope
IncSeq_dio_priv : forall y : nat, CodeNat y < -> l = 0 /\ 1 < q /\ y = 0 \/ 0 < l /\ (exists z v v1 : nat, seqs_of_ones v v1 /\ Code y /\ Code z /\ y + l * power (power (S l) 2) r = z * v ⇣ ((r - 1) * v1) /\ y + v1 + power (power 1 2) r = z + power (power (S l) 2) r)
seqs_of_ones_dio : forall u u1 : nat, seqs_of_ones u u1 < -> l = 0 /\ u = 0 /\ u1 = 0 /\ 2 <= q \/ 0 < l /\ l + 1 < q /\ (exists u2 w r0 r1 p1 p2 : nat, r0 = r /\ r1 + 1 = r0 /\ p1 = power (1 + l) 2 /\ p2 = power p1 r0 /\ 1 + r1 * w = r0 * p2 /\ u * u = u1 + u2 /\ u1 = u * u ⇣ w /\ u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) /\ r0 * r0 + u1 = u + p2 /\ divides (r0 * r0 * r0 * r0) u1)
Code_mult = fun ca cb cc : nat => l = 0 \/ l <> 0 /\ (exists v v1 r' r'' p : nat, r'' = r /\ r'' = r' + 1 /\ seqs_of_ones v v1 /\ p = ca * v ⇣ (r' * v1) /\ p = cb * cc ⇣ (r' * v1)) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Code_mult (_ _ _)%nat_scope
Const_dio : forall c v : nat, Const c v < -> l = 0 /\ 1 < q /\ v = 0 \/ 0 < l /\ l + 1 < q /\ (exists p u u1 : nat, p = power q 2 /\ c < p /\ seqs_of_ones u u1 /\ v = c * u)
Code_dio : forall a : nat, Code a < -> l = 0 /\ 1 < q /\ a = 0 \/ 0 < l /\ l + 1 < q /\ (exists p u u1 : nat, p + 1 = power q 2 /\ seqs_of_ones u u1 /\ a ≲ p * u)
const1_cn : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall u u1 : nat, u = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u1 = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S (S i)) 2) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> exists w u2 : nat, 1 + (power (4 * q) 2 - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) (power (4 * q) 2) /\ u * u = u1 + u2 /\ u1 = u * u ⇣ w /\ u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) /\ power 2 (power (4 * q) 2) + u1 = u + power (power (S l) 2) (power (4 * q) 2) /\ divides (power 4 (power (4 * q) 2)) u1
mk_full : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall w u u1 u2 : nat, 1 + (power (4 * q) 2 - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) (power (4 * q) 2) -> u * u = u1 + u2 -> u1 = u * u ⇣ w -> u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) -> power 2 (power (4 * q) 2) + u1 = u + power (power (S l) 2) (power (4 * q) 2) ->...-> nat | u1 = ∑ (S m) (fun i : nat => power (k i) (power (4 * q) 2)) /\ m <= power (S l) 2 /\ (forall i : nat, i < S m -> k i <= power (S l) 2) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < S m -> k i < k j)}}
bool_list.lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive = bool_list.lb_mask_equiv_trans : RelationClasses.Transitive bool_list.lb_mask_equiv Expanded type for implicit arguments bool_list.lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive : forall [x y z : list bool], bool_list.lb_mask_equiv x y -> bool_list.lb_mask_equiv y z -> bool_list.lb_mask x z /\ bool_list.lb_mask z x Arguments bool_list.lb_mask_equiv_rst_Transitive [x y z]
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
binary_power_split : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall i a : nat, {u : nat & {v : nat | a = u ⇡ v * power i r /\ (forall k : nat, u ⇣ (k * power i r) = 0)}}
obtain_u_u1_value : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall w u u1 u2 : nat, 1 + (power (4 * q) 2 - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) (power (4 * q) 2) -> u * u = u1 + u2 -> u1 = u * u ⇣ w -> u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) -> power 2 (power (4 * q) 2) + u1 = u + power (power (S l) 2) (power (4 * q) 2) -> divides (power 4 (power (4 * q) 2)) u1 -> u = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S i) 2) (power (4 * q) 2)) /\ u1 = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power (power (S (S i)) 2) (power (4 * q) 2))
is_cipher_of = fun (f : nat -> nat) (a : nat) => l + 1 < q /\ (forall i : nat, i < l -> f i < power q 2) /\ a = ∑ l (fun i : nat => f i * power (power (S i) 2) r) : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_cipher_of _%function_scope _%nat_scope
is_cipher_of_const_1 : forall u : nat, 0 < l -> is_cipher_of (fun _ : nat => 1) u < -> l + 1 < q /\ (exists u1 : nat, seqs_of_ones u u1)
is_cipher_of_0 : forall (f : nat -> nat) (a : nat), l = 0 -> is_cipher_of f a < -> 1 < q /\ a = 0
euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}
binomial.binomial = fix binomial (n p : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S _ => 0 end | S n0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S p0 => binomial n0 p0 + binomial n0 (S p0) end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments binomial.binomial (_ _)%nat_scope
nat_meet_euclid_power_2 : forall q r1 d1 r2 d2 : nat, r1 < power q 2 -> r2 < power q 2 -> (r1 + d1 * power q 2) ⇣ (r2 + d2 * power q 2) = r1 ⇣ r2 + d1 ⇣ d2 * power q 2
scal_one : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (k : nat) (x : X), mscal sum zero k x = times (mscal sum zero k one) x
Const = fun c v : nat => exists f : nat -> nat, is_cipher_of f v /\ (forall i : nat, i < l -> f i = c) : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Const (_ _)%nat_scope
sum_2_power_2_injective : forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 <= i1 -> j2 <= i2 -> power i1 2 + power j1 2 = power i2 2 + power j2 2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2
const_u1_prefix : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> {q0 : nat | q0 <= m /\ u * u ⇣ w = ∑ q0 (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))}
binomial_Newton : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x y : X, sum x y = sum y x) -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : X), times a b = times b a -> mscal times one n (sum a b) = msum sum zero (S n) (fun i : nat => mscal sum zero (binomial.binomial n i) (times (mscal times one (n - i) a) (mscal times one i b)))
sum_powers_binary_le_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = ∑ k (fun i : nat => g i * power (e (h i)) r) /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}
all_ones_dio : forall r : nat, 2 <= r -> forall l w : nat, w = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r) < -> 1 + (r - 1) * w = power l r
all_ones_joins : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall n w : nat, w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> w = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 1 * power i (power (4 * q) 2))
all_ones_2_joins : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall n w : nat, w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * w = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 2 * power i (power (4 * q) 2))
is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => divides r p /\ divides r q /\ (forall k : nat, divides k p -> divides k q -> divides k r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
BinInt.Z.max_spec : forall n m : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.lt n m /\ BinInt.Z.max n m = m \/ BinInt.Z.le m n /\ BinInt.Z.max n m = n
nat_meet_mult_power2 : forall q x y : nat, x * power q 2 ⇣ (y * power q 2) = x ⇣ y * power q 2
nat_join_monoid = {| monoid_unit_l := fun x : nat => nat_join_0n x; monoid_unit_r := fun x : nat => nat_join_n0 x; monoid_assoc := fun x y z : nat => nat_join_assoc x y z |} : monoid_theory nat_join 0
Hu2_w : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2))) ⇣ w = 0
double_sum_powers_ortho : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> f i j < r) -> (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 < i1 < n -> j2 < i2 < n -> e i1 j1 = e i2 j2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r)) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r))
const_u2_meet : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * k < k' -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i = power (S i) 2) -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2)))
const_u_square : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u * u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) + ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) (power (4 * q) 2)))
Hseq_u : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> forall a : nat, a <= m -> ∑ a (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) = msum nat_join 0 a (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
const_u1_meet : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> 2 * k < k' -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ w < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
Hu1 : forall l q : nat, 0 < l -> l + 1 < q -> forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < power (4 * q) 2 -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i (power (4 * q) 2)) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2)) = msum nat_join 0 m (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) (power (4 * q) 2))
mult_lt_power_2_4' : forall u1 v1 u2 v2 k : nat, u1 < power k 2 -> v1 < power k 2 -> u2 < power k 2 -> v2 < power k 2 -> u1 * v1 + v2 * u2 < power (4 * k) 2
nat_meet_powers_neq : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall i j a b : nat, i <> j -> a < r -> b < r -> a * power i r ⇣ (b * power j r) = 0
sum_power_binary_lt_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> exists a : nat -> nat, m = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2)

``` 
intros.
split.
- split.
  + apply IncSeq_dio_priv. assumption.
  + right. split.
    * apply IncSeq_dio_priv. assumption.
    * exists z, v, v1, p0, p1, p2, r1. repeat split; try assumption.
- intros [H1 [H2 H3]].
  apply IncSeq_dio_priv. split; try assumption.
  destruct H1 as [-> | [H4 H5]].
  + left. assumption.
  + right. split; try assumption.
    exists z, v, v1. repeat split; try assumption.
    exists z, v, v1, p0, p1, p2, r1. repeat split; try assumption.
Qed.

original: intros. split. - split. + apply IncSeq_dio_priv. auto. + right. split. * apply IncSeq_dio_priv. auto. * exists z, v, v1, p0, p1, p2, r1. repeat split; try auto. - intros [H1 [H2 H3]]. apply IncSeq_dio_priv. split; try auto. destruct H1 as [-> | [H4 H5]]. + left. auto. + right. split; try auto. exists z, v, v1. repeat split; try auto. exists z, v, v1, p0, p1, p2, r1. repeat split; try auto.
